item.title: Automatically Decline and Delete or Accept and Delete Outlook 2010 Meetings
item.description: You can follow the Microsoft TechNet guide to add VisualBasic code in Outlook rules. You can just replace the code they give with this: Sub AutoDeclineMeetings(oRequest As MeetingItem) ' If its not a meeting, we don't process If oRequest.MessageClass <> "IPM.Schedule.Meeting.Request" Then Exit Sub End If ' Get the appointment in the meeting Dim oAppt As AppointmentItem Set oAppt = oRequest.GetAssociatedAppointment(True) ' Send a decline response Dim oResponse Set oResponse = oAppt.
